channel.title: NPC drops simply wont work? NEED HELP!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've been [b]trying[/b] to fix some of my drops, earlier I've done Bandos and that turned out really well. However now I try doing Tormented Demons and it just all goes wrong here, I've done everything I'm sure but the drop just wont come up.
In my NPCDrops.TSM map: [code=javascript]#torm demon 8349:25 1275:1 1275:1 3052:50 14484:1 3052:50 561:1000 561:1000 561:1000 995:10000000 1275:1 14484:1 1127:1 995:75000 1127:1 14484:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 3052:50 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 3052:50 1275:1 3052:50 14472:1 14474:1 1275:1 11476:1 3052:50 14484:1 114484:1 14484:1 14484:1 14472:1 14474:1 14476:1[/code]
In my NpcConstants.TSM:
[code=java]8349 592[/code]
In my NPCDrops.cfg I have nothing at the moment however I have had a few things in there but I don't really know what to do because I feel like I've tried every possibility.
I have however noticed that when I have my Constant drop in my NpcConstants.TSM file they ONLY show when I do [b]NOT[/b] have a second line of items in my NPCDrops.TSM file.
Heres my bandos in my NPCDrops.TSM:
[code=java5]#general graardor 6260:25 1275:1 1275:1 3052:50 11726:1 3052:50 561:1000 561:1000 561:1000 995:10000000 1275:1 11724:1 1127:1 995:75000 1127:1 11704:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 3052:50 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 3052:50 1275:1 3052:50 11704:1 3052:50 1275:1 454:150 3052:50 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 989:1[/code]
I really don't know what else to do :x. If you have any suggestions please leave a message, and if you need more information I'd be glad to post more :)
oh & by the way I'm running on the HybridPvP source wich I beleave is a 317 with 597 NPCs.

item.title: NPC drops simply wont work? NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Hey guys,

I’ve been trying to fix some of my drops, earlier I’ve done Bandos and that turned out really well. However now I try doing Tormented Demons and it just all goes wrong here, I’ve done everything I’m sure but the drop just wont come up.

In my NPCDrops.TSM map:

#torm demon 8349:25 1275:1 1275:1 3052:50 14484:1 3052:50 561:1000 561:1000 561:1000 995:10000000 1275:1 14484:1 1127:1 995:75000 1127:1 14484:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 3052:50 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 3052:50 1275:1 3052:50 14472:1 14474:1 1275:1 11476:1 3052:50 14484:1 114484:1 14484:1 14484:1 14472:1 14474:1 14476:1

In my NpcConstants.TSM:

In my NPCDrops.cfg I have nothing at the moment however I have had a few things in there but I don’t really know what to do because I feel like I’ve tried every possibility.

I have however noticed that when I have my Constant drop in my NpcConstants.TSM file they ONLY show when I do NOT have a second line of items in my NPCDrops.TSM file.

Heres my bandos in my NPCDrops.TSM:

#general graardor 6260:25 1275:1 1275:1 3052:50 11726:1 3052:50 561:1000 561:1000 561:1000 995:10000000 1275:1 11724:1 1127:1 995:75000 1127:1 11704:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 1127:1 3052:50 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 1602:1 3052:50 1275:1 3052:50 11704:1 3052:50 1275:1 454:150 3052:50 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 989:1

I really don’t know what else to do :x. If you have any suggestions please leave a message, and if you need more information I’d be glad to post more

oh & by the way I’m running on the HybridPvP source wich I beleave is a 317 with 597 NPCs.
